songs.title: Illuminati (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
Sarkodie
(Verse 1):

Arhh, yeah, ahah, arhh

Yo, tia First na monka masem, fisa na meni bi
Enna cash aba nti mob fra me illuminati
Sorry, moany lucky on my way to grammy
Mako join group wae anka men push bugatti
Me i think its funny, cuz i keep on making money
Twadiampon no blessing reflect tisa tsunami
DJ Mensah, Kess ne Giovanni
Nyankopon se ama men shaky walking through the valley
You believe in Juju i believe in power
Kristofo a mo doubt Nyame, mo gyedia muaha sa asaawa
Nyame twan me heaven, i dont have to give up
Moa mosei me din no, monni vim, you better speak up
Me swag, me chemistry, me flow, ya legendry
Amfa soho ancompare Sarkodie cuz i’m da best you’ve ever seen
Me style especially me hustle, me courtesy
Ma bri me mogya anim a hustle afea dieaa mose meya
Illuminati!

(Chorus) (x2)

Afea dieaa omo se sarkodie oya illuminati
Obidiponbidi

(Verse 2):

Hwa pause beat no second
I think its controversial
Baileys fo contacti me, omo pa commercial
Half a milli, for me, never
Afei dieaa oma double up, next time, better
The Lord is still my shepherd, aponkye biara nni
Crossing
Mo feel sa ma speed up, still mehu no sa trotting
Sammy Forson, you better do the talking
Ma moo nti asea cash ahe a me spendi just on shopping
Meya mason koraa aka menya free, i swear walaahi
Meya illuminati anka mentu nkotina Hawaii
Nyankopon ni makokyam, me mefra no daddy
Nti daa me praisi Yesu still aa mose meya illuminati!

(Chorus) (x2)

Afea diea omo se Sarkodie oya illuminati

K9
(Verse 3):

Okay now 1st of all I had to put my verse on this beat
I know that time is money but you gotta wait/weight like Fg
Salute the real gawd, ain't talkin Pistol, Sabza, Thai-Chi
A grade 10 falling from the sky, I dropped a 16
Shit! If you hating, hala back
I juss sold a heart attack
Got numbers like starter pack
Impossible, I can't be whack
I do it big but I ain't fat
Moneoa's P, I'm gona tap
Ex be wanting S-E-X
K9 on this fucken track
Yo Sarkodie, move aside
And Lemme kill you on this beat
I'm killing niggas who are 27, I'm juss 17
I'm spittin sick, you would think Eminem wrote this shit for me
You hatin' niggas at the bottom like AKA's new gold teeth
The name is K9 if you asking who's this -
New kid on the block like Tetris
I put Vaal rappers in a casket
These niggas gon try and bite my style, they'll need a dentist
K-Bosso ntwana, rappers know it's lunchtime
I got another brain, you can say I changed my mind
Motherfuck yo 4 cousins, they like to wine
Fuck you niggas talkin, you my sons, it's bedtime!

(Verse 4)

Tea, afea moti me ni aa na moti pai mo
Nti meya bonsam, sa modi nkra no
Akoma moadanfo fo
Aba no saa no, sa mo dea adwen fen nti Nyame nhyira
Mo
Anya mo na mo hwa me nti montumi nkyere me foko
Mofeeli me style, me flow ne me shoto
Mopa sa mo claimi anso mona moni kobo
Moni no be problem, ano eni me moto
Anya mona me nia medi nti woka meho asam aa
Menka no by force
Omo si Obidi ya illuminati, gya rough
Ya di Nyame so ne titi me
Nti na me ba stage aa, me se oh my God
Ma me nkyere mosa Nyame na waya efisa mogyedi
Tisa Nylon
Woba wu ansa na wanya din pa
Asamoah Gyan na oya aginkwa
Nfumso baako na biribia asesa
Wobe hwe na wodin apepa
Adan na mose meya Demon
Obidi my legacy go live on
Rap no ahye ma ti sa weavon
Meya stubborn but manfra me illuminati!

(Chorus)

Afea dieaa omo se sarkodie oya illuminati
